segments.text: Linda , would you care for some candies or cookies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , don't try to tempt me . I'm becoming chubby , and I have to slim down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are not really chubby . You are actually thin enough .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think so . I know I've put on weight this winter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you are watching your weight , aren't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , to tell you the truth . I am on a diet .
segments.speaker: S2
